1: Ri u c'ojol ri Benjamin are ri Bela, ri u nabeal; Asbel, ri ucab; Ahar, ri urox;
2: Noha, ri ucaj, Rap, ri ro'.
3: Ri e u c'ojol ri Bela e are' wa' Adar, Jer, Abiud,
6: Ri e u c'ojol ri Aod, e c'amal tak qui be ri cachalal xejeki' pa Jeb ri xebesax c'u wi bic xec'am bic pa Manahat,
7: e are' ri Naaman, Ahiy xukuje' ri Jer, qui tat ri Uza xukuje' ri Ahiud, are' c'u wa' ri xec'amow bic.
8: Ri Saharaim xec'oji' chi niq'uiaj e u c'ojol pa ri ulew Moab, aretak e u jachom chic ri rixokil Husim xukuje' ri Baar.
9: Ri e u c'ojol ri xebalax ruc' ri c'ac' rixokil, ri Hods u bi', e are' wa' Jobab, Sibiy, Mesa, Malcam,
10: Jeuz, Saquiy xukuje' ri Mirm. E are' tak u c'ojol wa', c'amal tak qui be ri cachalal.
11: Ruc' Husim ri rixokil xec'oji' quieb u c'ojol Abitob xukuje' ri Elpaal.
12: Ri e u c'ojol ri Elpaal e are' wa' Heber, Misam xukuje' ri Semed, ri xebuyac tak ri tinimit Ono xukuje' ri Lod, e cachil ri e alaj tak qui tinimit;
13: ri Beriy xukuje' ri Sema, e c'amal tak qui be ri cachalaxic ri xejeki' can pa Ajalon, ri xequesaj tak bic ri winak ri e jekel can ojer pa Gat;
14: xukuje' tak ri cachalal Sasac xukuje' ri Jeroham.
16: Micael, Ispa xukuje' ri Joha e u c'ojol ri Beriy.
18: Ismeray, Jezliy xukuje' ri Jobab e are' wa' ri e u c'ojol ri Elpaal.
21: Adaiy, Beraiy xukuje' ri Simrat e u c'ojol ri Simeiy.
25: Ipdaiy xukuje' ri Peniel e u c'ojol ri Sasac.
27: Jaresiy, Eliy xukuje' ri Zicr e are' tak wa' ri e u c'ojol ri Jeroham.
28: E are' tak c'amal be wa' ri nimak qui k'ij ri xec'amow tak qui be ri cachalaxic pa tak ri quija'lil, ri xejeki' pa Jerusalen.
29: Pa ri tinimit Gabaon jekel wi ri Jehiel, u tat ri Gabaon. Ri rixokil Maac u bi'.
30: Ri e u c'ojol e are' ri Abdon, ri nabeal, Zur, Sis, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
32: xukuje' ri Miclot, u tat ri Simey. E xukuje' c'u wa', xquitakej u banic quech ri xequiban ri cachalal, xejeki' chquiw√§ch pa Jerusalen.
33: Ri u c'ojol ri Ner are' ri Sis, ri u c'ojol ri Sis are' ri Saul, ri e u c'ojol ri Saul are' ri Jonatan, Malquixu, Abinadab xukuje' ri Es-baal.
34: Ri u c'ojol ri Jonatan are' ri Merib-baal, ri u c'ojol ri Merib-baal are' ri Micaiy.
35: Ri e u c'ojol ri Micaiy e are' ri Piton, Melec, Tarey xukuje' ri Acaz.
36: Ri u c'ojol ri Acaz are' ri Joad, ri e u c'ojol ri Joad are' ri Alemet, Azmabet xukuje' ri Zimri; ri u c'ojol ri Zimri are' ri Mos,
37: ri u c'ojol ri Mos are' ri Bin, ri u c'ojol ri Bin are' ri Rap, ri u c'ojol ri Rap are' ri Elas, ri u c'ojol ri Elas are' ri Azel.
38: Ri e u c'ojol ri Azel e wakib, je c'u qui bi' wa': Azricam, Bocru, Ismael, Seariy, Obadiy xukuje' ri Hanan. E are' tak wa' ri e u c'ojol ri Azel.
39: Ri e u c'ojol ri rachalal Esec e are' ri Ulam, ri nabeal; Jeus, ri ucab, Elipelet c'ut, ri urox.
40: Ri e u c'ojol ri Ulam e are' wa' e cowilaj tak ajch'ojab, e nawinelab che u cojic ri q'uiakbal ch'ab. E q'ui ri qui c'ojol xec'ojic xukuje' ri e qui' tak qui mam, e jun sient cawinak lajuj (150) chi conojel, conojel we winak ri' e rija'lil ri Benjamin.
